items.strItemDescription: This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet. It was crafted from the claw of a highly toxic creature of unknown origin.
This weapon required a Dragon Amulet. It its topped with the claw of a rare monster whose outter shell is pure gold.
This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet. This special brass sabre/gun is self-loading and never backfires.
This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet. It was crafted from pure silver mined under the surface of the moon.
This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet. It was crafted from pure silver mined under the surface of the moon.
This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet. It was crafted from pure silver mined under the surface of the moon.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet. Its dual blades strike at your foes with a hunger that only a true burgler could possess.
This item requires a Dragon Amulet. Its golden extierior belies a remarkable mysticite core, which helps a mage focus their energy for more damage.
This large sword is amazingly light and well balanced, but requires a Dragon Amulet to wield. A special process was used to prepare the magic blade adding a purple tint to it.
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this dagger in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the dagger has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
This massive axe was found in a cave in the far north. The cursed metal it's forged from seems to draw cold to it.
This blade was forged from corrupted ice. It draws wandering souls to itself and can even heal you for a small amount.
The official sword of Dage the Sneevil's minions!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this staff in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the staff has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this sword in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the sword has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
Cysero copied the design used by zardbies stricken with the dreaded Z-virus! He took special precautions so that you wouldn't catch the virus, too!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this staff in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the staff has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this sword in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the sword has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
The official sword of Dage the Sneevil's minions!

This is the counterpart to the Mighty 100k, the most expensive gold weapon in DragonFable! Cysero used his connections to get a copy of it. If you can't see yourself farming 100,000 gold for a weapon, this is a great alternative!
You asked for it! This Rutilated Ripper is GIGANTIC! Only a REAL hero can wield a weapon of THIS magnitude! And the gem will coordinate with your outfit!
This scythe will rip through your enemies with style! The gems will coordinate with your outfit, too!
This massive axe was found in a cave in the far north. The cursed metal it's forged from seems to draw cold to it.
This blade was forged from corrupted ice. It draws wandering souls to itself and can even heal you for a small amount.
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!

All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards the study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards the study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
Your hand tingles just holding this blade. You're not sure if it's solid or if it will burst away in a flash.
This blade pulses malevolently as the soul of Dagera, the Forsaken, tries to escape.
Crafted from leftover shards of the Ice Scythe, this dagger will show its true power in the upcoming Fire War.
Crafted from leftover shards of the Ice Scythe, this mace will show it's true power in the coming Fire War.
The runes on this wicked gunblade glow with the heat from the barrel.
The power of For'Zoun, the Unfaithful, pulses through this staff.
Your hand tingles just holding this staff. You're not sure if it's solid or if it will burst away in a flash.
Your hand tingles just holding this blade. You're not sure if it's solid or if it will burst away in a flash.
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
Trapped within this sword is Ge'Raskon, the Vindictive One.
Crafted from leftover shards of the Ice Scythe, this wand will show it's true power in the coming Fire War.
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
The icy blade of this axe will tear through your enemies.
The icy edge of this dagger will tear through your enemies.
The intense heat of this blade rivals that of Yulgar's Forge.
This strange blade was forged in the far north near Dragesvard, in the slowing waters of the sea. The strange properties make it deadly accurate.
The icy power of this staff will tear through your enemies.
The intense heat of this staff rivals that of Yulgar's Forge.
This strange staff was forged in the far north near Dragesvard, in the slowing waters of the sea. The strange properties make it deadly accurate.
The intense heat of this blade rivals that of Yulgar's Forge.
This strange blade was forged in the far north near Dragesvard, in the slowing waters of the sea. The strange properties make it deadly accurate.
Cysero traded one of his right socks for this stunning axe design.
Cysero traded one of his right socks for this stunning dagger design.
Cysero traded one of his right socks for this stunning staff design.
This great dagger was carved from the wood of some of the oldest trees on Lore. They were felled by one of the ancient dragons as she rampaged through the world.
These daggers are rumored to make monsters of their wielders.
This great mace was carved from the wood of some of the oldest trees on Lore. They were felled by one of the ancient dragons as she rampaged through the world.
This great staff was carved from the wood of some of the oldest trees on Lore. They were felled by one of the ancient dragons as she rampaged through the world.
This staff is rumored to make monsters of its wielders.
This sword is rumored to make monsters of it's wielders.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this dagger in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the daggerhas a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
This shadowy blade cut's through the air with a mere whisper.
Hewn from the Lymcrest valley this heavy dagger can only be wielded by one of great strength and dexterity.
You can hear the siren's cry as the wind flows around this staff.
Hewn from the Lymcrest valley this heavy staff can only be wielded by one of great intelligence.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this staff in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the staff has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this sword in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the sword has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
A siren's song plays along the lithe blade of this sword.
Hewn from the Lymcrest valley this heavy sword can only be wielded by one of great strength.
This style of weapon was crafted by Cysero in honor of all his friends, who are ready to jump to his defense at any moment.
Orbs of light float around this dagger in a pattern designed to stun the mana-force of your enemies.
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
This blade was forged from corrupted ice. It draws wandering souls to itself and can even heal you for a small amount.
This massive axe was found in a cave in the far north. The cursed metal it's forged from seems to draw cold to it.
Two beams of pure light shoot out from either end of this hilt. You might feel something like a jedi, if you had any idea what that was.
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
This style of weapon was crafted by Cysero in honor of all his friends, who are ready to jump to his defense at any moment.
This style of weapon was crafted by Cysero in honor of all his friends, who are ready to jump to his defense at any moment.
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
Cysero copied the design used by zardbies stricken with the dreaded Z-virus! He took special precautions so that you wouldn't catch the virus, too!
The light shining off this sword will entrance your enemies, causing them to freeze in order to watch the play of light on the blade.
This powerful blade was used by ghost hunter Renji, who competed with ghost hunter Itchi in his earlier days. Now the two work together at the "Itchi Goes" delivery service in Swordhaven.
This is the released form of ghost hunter Itchi's soul staff, which he once used to battle angry spirits and send them to the next world.
This is the released form of ghost hunter Itchi's soul blade, which he once used to battle angry spirits and send them to the next world.
This weapon is powered by a magically contained mini black-hole. Don't make it angry.
This dagger was magically coaxed from the heart of an ancient oak tree over the course of three lunar cycles, using druidic nature magic.
This staff was grown from a trimming from the right pointer finger of the Greenman himself. It's ok, he can grow it back.
This weapon is powered by a magically contained mini black-hole. Don't feed it.
This weapon is powered by a magically contained mini black-hole. Don't poke it.

Forest's Edge is a sword unlike any other. Its blade was cut from a normal ash tree but finished with enchanted oils which flow through the wood like sap, giving it continued life. This sword must be trimmed once every two weeks.
This weapon was created by the Monks of Corruption to spread the fear and pain of diseases. You'll want to wash your hands after using it.
This dagger was once used to save a seaside village plagued by a ...well, a plague brought there by a mysterious pirate captain. The disease was forever contained within the blade of this dagger.

This staff was once used to slay Murskoch, the Plague Carrier. The monster's plague has permanently soiled the spear, but given the spear the ability to focus magic energies... so it's not all bad, I guess.
This style of dagger is used by a group calling themselves Hunters. They seek out and destroy any and all servants of the darkness that they can find.
This style of staff is used by a group calling themselves Hunters. They seek out and destroy any and all servants of the darkness that they can find.
This style of blade is used by a group calling themselves Hunters. They seek out and destroy any and all servants of the darkness that they can find.
This dagger is carved from a magically crafted material called Ice-Ten, which is an alternate type of water that can remain solid at room temperature.
This staff is carved from a magically crafted material called Ice-Ten, which is an alternate type of water that can remain solid at room temperature.
This blade is carved from a magically crafted material called Ice-Ten, which is an alternate type of water that can remain solid at room temperature.
This emerald blade is enchanted by the winds of change! It is also Cysero's favorite color.
Vorstorm and seven years ago...
This blade was actually sharpened by the winds of a hurricane. The runes along the blade create a magical link between the Dao and the elemental plane of Wind.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Water magic. It's the type of wand used by the hydromancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to make more of a splash.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this dagger in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the dagger has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies..

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this staff in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the staff has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this sword in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the sword has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Light magic. It's the type of wand used by the solaramancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to outshine other wands.
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
This blade was created using metamorphic ores mined from deep within the Lymcrest Mines.
This weapon was cursed by the spirits of nature. Burdened with all the powers of fall and winter, this weapon represents death in all of its forms.
This scythe will rip through your enemies with style! The gems coordinate with your outfit, too!
You asked for it! This Rutilated Ripper is GIGANTIC! Only a REAL hero can wield a weapon of THIS magnitude! The gems will coordinate with your outfit, too!
The official sword of Dage the Sneevil's minions!
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
This staff was created using metamorphic ores mined from deep within the Lymcrest Mines.
This weapon was cursed by the spirits of nature. Burdened with all the powers of fall and winter, this weapon represents death in all of its forms.
This weapon was cursed by the spirits of nature. Burdened with all the powers of fall and winter, this weapon represents death in all of its forms.
This blade was created using metamorphic ores mined from deep within the Lymcrest Mines.
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
Cysero copied the design used by zardbies stricken with the dreaded Z-virus! He took special precautions so that you wouldn't catch the virus, too!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
This style of dagger is enchanted with the glowing orbs used by the elven people to light their homes in the deep forests of Lore. Stab it into your bed-side table for a nice nightlight.
This style of staff is enchanted with the glowing orbs used by the elven people to light their homes in the deep forests of Lore. The bulb is impact-resistant for better monster thwacking.
This style of sword is enchanted with the glowing orbs used by the elven people to light their homes in the deep forests of Lore. Comes in 50, 75, 100 and 125 watt varieties.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Nature magic. It's the type of wand used by the naturamancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to overpower other weapons, naturally.
You can only use this axe if you have a soul, as it feeds from its spark. You shouldn't have sold your soul to that horned fellow, whoops!
This dagger was made by someone old. Really old. And the blade is hot. Really hot. So don't touch it too much or it will probably burn off your hand.
This is a tall, fiery stick. It hurls fireballs and is quite powerful. Just don't make it mad...if so, there will be blazephemous results.
Ghost hunter Itchi once used this dagger to capture and purify the tormented spirits of the dead. Now he runs a delivery business in Swordhaven called "Itchi Goes!" so he no longer needs the weapon.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.

Ghost hunter Itchi once used this powerful staff to contact the "other side" and commune with the spirits. Now he runs a delivery business in Swordhaven called "Itchi Goes!" so he no longer needs the weapon.
All sales go towards the study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards the study of Mad Weaponsmithing.

Ghost hunter Itchi once used his soulblade to send the tormented souls of the undead into the afterlife. Now he runs a delivery business in Swordhaven called "Itchi Goes!" so he no longer needs the weapon.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
All sales go towards they study of Mad Weaponsmithing.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Fire magic. It's the type of wand used by the pyromancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered for more fire power.
This weapon resembles the original Truthsayer, but it was clearly created as a pervision of the original weapon. A wicked reflection of the original hero's weapon.
This dagger uses echolocation to locate the center of your opponent in order to do maximum damage! Never say sound isn't powerful!
This magical weapon is created from water drawn from the Pure Pool.
This magical weapon is created from water drawn from the Pure Pool.
The graceful curves which make up this staff will draw in your opponents eyes and trap them in a maze of rounded edges and muted colors.
At first glance, this staff resembles the lost Glorystaff but upon closer inspection it's clear that this staff's creator intended it as a mockery of the original.
This sword appears to be a replica of the famous Bloodblade, but subtle changes to the design have been made mocking the honorable nature of the original weapon.
Soundwaves twine up the rounded crystalline edges of this weapon, gathering force and then emitting in a BLAST of sound that will knock your opponents down!
This magical weapon is created from water drawn from the Pure Pool.
Often confused for an ice pick this dagger has low self esteem. If you listen closely you can hear the weapon mutter Awl shucks.
A mystery of science, this staff is very theatrical in its requirement of twenty five cents to unleash the full energy of its sugar packed gumballs.
This crackly energy blade does not have any runes on it whatsoever. We do not know why it is called the Runeblade.
Forged on the highest mountain in Lore, this blade is blessed by the Wind Lord.
Forged on top of the highest mountain in Lore, this staff is blessed by the Wind Lord.
Forged on the top of the highest peak in Lore, this blade has been blessed by the Wind Lord.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Wind magic. It's the type of wand used by the aeromancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to cause stronger blows.
This ice dagger was carved entirely from the tooth of an icetiger from the frozen wastes of the north. Brrrrr.
Made by a master weaponsmith, this dagger is imbued with the energy of the sun.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this dagger in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the dagger has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this staff in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the staff has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
Made by a master weaponsmith, this staff is imbued with the energy of the sun.
This icy rod has a core of magical ice, wrapped in a sheath of magical ice covered by a hard external shell of magical ice. Guess what type of magical damage it does....
This sword was forged in the center of a mighty glacier, taking its power from the ancient ice under which it was made.
Made by a master weaponsmith, this sword is imbued with the energy of the sun.

Khazri commissioned Cysero to build this sword in honor of her pet eagle, Jova, after it saved her life when she was attacked by a monster. Imbued with Jova's essence, the sword has a special which is triggered when you fight reptilian enemies.
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
You feel as though time itself slows around the edge of your weapon.
Cysero copied the design used by zardbies stricken with the dreaded Z-virus! He took special precautions so that you wouldn't catch the virus, too!
CLICK ON THIS strange CorDemi item while holding it to change its shape to best suit you. This version of the Codex is for those who have mastered its power.
This dagger is built from a special material of combined fire and glass. Originally this material was used to make glasses that keep your tea warm, but people kept burning themselves.

This staff is constructed from Fireglass, which is a magic material that is made by combining fire and glass together. The material holds certain properties from both materials, and a few new properties that neither glass nor fire have.
This sword was constructed of a special hybrid material which is half glass, half fire. This Fireglass has been sharpened to a razor edge.
This weapon was blessed by the spirits of nature. Gifted with all the powers of spring and summer growth, this weapon represents life in all of its forms.
This weapon was blessed by the spirits of nature. Gifted with all the powers of spring and summer growth, this weapon represents life in all of its forms.
This weapon was blessed by the spirits of nature. Gifted with all the powers of spring and summer growth, this weapon represents life in all of its forms.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Energy magic. It's the type of wand used by the fulguramancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to shock people with its power.
This dagger is made of tempered steel and forged in a temperate forest village by a blacksmith of bad temper.
If you are strong enough it is said that you can create waves by striking still water with this mace. I do not know about you but I can make waves just by splashing my hand in a pool.
The spiral crystal is magically solidified water. The key word is magically. If it was naturally solidified this would be an ice weapon.
This magical dagger is made of everlasting shale, so that its blade can be flaked back to sharpness without ever running out of stone.
This dagger was made from a collection of broken blades, magic gem shards and left-over minerals. The final product seems to posess unforeseen magical properties.

There is a theory that states that if you have a lever long enough you can move the world. In this case, this magical staff was made to be the lever to only move mountains but that's still pretty good.
This weapon's magic blade was cut from an ancient statue of death, and it seems to have taken on some strange properties.
This sickening blade seems to be holding onto your hand, rather than the other way around. It's nice to be wanted.
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
This weapons seems to be whispering horrible things to you... things that you can't quite understand.
You can feel this sword squirming in your grip, but it's just a sword... it can't be breathing, right?
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
If one of the most powerful sources of magic on Lore is hugs, then it only makes sense that hamsters are powered by hamtons and trace elements like "cute".
A very defensive staff for those prone to accidents. The best offense is a good defense!
A weapon so powerful that it can tear open the heavens!
This dagger has tiny dragon wings for a hilt. That is reason enough to use it.
Made of unbreakable ultracarbonilatastic obsidiosum, this staff is much easier to wield than it is to talk about.
The design of this blade gives it greater cutting power than other blades of its size while reducing its weight.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Ice magic. It's the type of wand used by the cryomancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to leave other weapons out in the cold.
A beacon of light, a beacon of hope... as it was told by the one who last wielded this axe. Also makes a great flashlight...and makes julienne fries!
This dagger blinds you. No, for real. If you want to risk it, you can use it but it's been told that if you use it too much it can blind you forever. You've been warned!
Bright. Blinding. Glowy. This staff is all of these things and more. The more part you will just have to find out on your own. You didn't think we would give away all of its secrets, do you?
This dagger is said to make the wielder undetectable by those who attempt to peer into their future. They'll never see you coming.
This staff was created during a terrible thunderstorm, its shaft carved from an ancient oak that was split by lightning.
Forged in the moonlight from the heart of a fallen star.
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
This dagger appears to give off no heat at all, but a few minutes after a cut has been made the edges of the cut burst into flame on their own.
The official sword of Dage the Sneevil's minions!
Give yourself an edge in a time of chaos!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!

Once there were 12 magical fires set around the kingdom that burned day and night to keep the people of the kingdom surrounded by light and warmth. A flame from the 9th magical fire was used in the creation of this staff.
The blade of this weapons was, at first, SO powerfully enchanted with fire magic that it needed to be kept in a tank of water until other magics could make it possible to hold it.
CLICK ON THIS strange CorDemi item while holding it to change its shape to best suit you. This version of the otherworldly weapon is for more advanced adventurers.
Crafted with the scales of the Great Energy Dragon Volgritian, this weapon surges with shades of his power!
Brought by a traveling merchant from an exotic land, these weapons increase your damage against dragons!
Cysero copied the design used by zardbies stricken with the dreaded Z-virus! He took special precautions so that you wouldn't catch the virus, too!
This dagger was forged from a rare metal panned from the swift waters of the Time Stream.
This magical staff was carved from the rare trees growing on the steep banks of the Time Stream.
This swords blade is made from special metal panned from the cold waters of the Time Stream.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Stone magic. It's the type of wand used by the geomancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to really rock.
It's been told that if you fall on this axe, all the water within its workings comes pouring down on you in revenge. Tread carefully young one.
A huge powerful wave. This is what this dagger does to, you know, the baddies that you fight. Just be careful, it might splosh you.
It was told that Poseidon himself crafted this staff, but then the real one was found. This is probably just a cheap knock off.
A magical dagger designed for those who have foes to silence. This weapon guarantees that they will speak no more.
This magic staff is for the mage who likes to keep an ace hidden up his sleeve.
A blade simply designed for payback. If you need to get even, this is the weapon for you.
The rare red ice of this blade is from a glacier infused with deadly red fog.
The rare red ice of this blade is from a glacier infused with deadly red fog.
The rare red ice of this wand is from a glacier infused with deadly red fog.
This dagger was forged from several captured rays of light, and retains its edge as only a beam of light can.

This staff has been anointed in sun oil that keeps it glowing with the warmth of a summer's day even in the darkest coldest night. The bad part is that you need to cover it with a blanket or something in order get to sleep.
This weapon has been magically enchanted to defend you against all enemies, even while you sleep.
This wand is named for the ancient word for Dark magic. It's the type of wand used by the noctomancers of Swordhaven, but it's been magically altered to leave other weapons in the dark.
Rip through your foes with the screaming wind power of this dagger, now made with 10% more spectre!
Thought to be lost in time, this staff's magical design was rediscovered after years of research.
Sealed for centuries in the tomb of a dead emperor, this sword was removed and reforged to remove its fatal curse....probably.
CLICK ON THIS strange CorDemi item while holding it to change its shape to best suit you. This is the most basic version of the otherworldly weapon.
